Welcome to my website! My name is Gabriela Palomo and I am a carnivore ecologist from Guatemala (Central America). I am currently an Assistant Professor at Universidad del Valle de Guatemala. Previously, I did a post doc in the US at the University of Maryland with [Dr Travis Gallo](https://urbanxnaturelab.com/) and a post doc at Kansas University with [Dr Adam Ahlers](https://hnr.k-state.edu/about/people/faculty/ahlers-adam/). I use this website to keep my blog called [My Digital Notebook](blog.html) and my data visualization portfolio. I also include here information on how to contact me.

**If you would like me to review a paper please email me here:** 

[gabriella.palomo@gmail.com](mailto:gabriella.palomo@gmail.com)
